objects.text:
• 100% Pure, No Preservatives
• Rich in Essential Nutrients
• Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Premium Dairy Milk - Pure & Natural Goodness
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Fresh Cow's Milk
• No Preservatives or Artificial Additives
• Rich in Essential Nutrients & Calcium
• Pasteurized for Safety
• Farm-to-Table Freshness Guaranteed
• Available in Various Sizes
• Perfect for Drinking, Cooking & Baking
• Creamy Texture & Natural Taste
• Sourced from Local Dairy Farms
• Eco-Friendly Glass Packaging Options

banner_details:
This banner design features a split background with a smooth gradient on the left side and a clean white-blue gradient on the right, creating a fresh and inviting appearance. The left section contains multiple text elements arranged vertically for promotional messaging. The topmost text (`heading`) promotes the product with bold typography in a deep blue tone. Below it, the brightly colored text (`tagline`) draws attention to a limited-time offer in energetic orange. A bullet list (`description`) highlights the product benefits in legible blue text. The subheading (`subheading`) urges action, also in vibrant orange, leading to the bold pricing (`price`) displayed clearly. At the bottom, a striking call-to-action button comprises a colored rectangle (`cta_background`) with white, bold text (`cta`) reading a strong directive. The right section displays a realistic image (`product_image`) of milk bottles and a glass, reinforcing the product. The aesthetic is fresh, clean, and vitality-focused. 

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Blue: `#1E5B9B`
- Sky Blue Gradient: `#E8F4FF` to `#C5E1FF`
- Accent Orange: `#FF6B35`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Pale Blue: `#F0F8FF`
product_color: The product image features milk in clear glass containers, creating a clean, fresh, and wholesome aesthetic. The main color palette consists of soft whites and cool blues, which convey purity and health. The milk's color is a smooth, creamy white (#F8F8F3), contrasted against the bluish tint of the glass (#A8D0F0) and reflective highlights (#D3E6F7). The glass texture subtly blends the blue and white, creating a refreshing cool tone while enhancing brightness and focus. These hues work harmoniously to spotlight the milk while maintaining an elegant minimalist look. Ideal banner colors: #F8F8F3, #A8D0F0, #D3E6F7, #E0F5FF, and #BFD9EA.
